newsitem.title: JAPAN: Honda Motor seen raising 96/97 dividend - paper.
newsitem.headline: Honda Motor seen raising 96/97 dividend - paper.

text.p: Honda Motor Co Ltd is expected to raise its annual dividend for the year to March 31, 1997, to 15 yen from the 14 yen it paid in 1995/96, due to robust sales of recreational vehicles and the yen's weaker trend, Japanese economic daily Nihon Keizai Shimbun said on Tuesday.
Honda officials were not immediately available for comment.
The paper said Honda is expected to post a parent current profit of 120 billion yen in 1996/97 against 47.18 billion yen the previous year.
